blog.name: amym32687
blog.title: Rogue-Slayer Art
blog.description: My entire profile Amy32687 got blocked with the new Tumblr ban so I had to create an entire new profile to get my art seen. Please follow, comment, and reblog anything you like. Asks always welcome. <3 My Twitter is @LoveBitchPuddin. My DeviantArt is Rogue-Slayer. My Instagram is PatriciaMollohan. My Patreon is www.patreon.com/Rogue_Slayer. If you like my art please check it out!

body:
Made a Patreon!

https://www.patreon.com/Rogue_Slayer

Please check it out if you like my work so far and want to support it!


I made it because i really only get to draw in my free time, between working a retail job and taking care of my 3 year old Ronan, so I figured I would try to make a few pennies on the side doing something I enjoy. <3

summary: Kirishima's been running short on money lately, so he picks up a job at the local mall. He works in the food court at a little...
body: Kirishima’s been running short on money lately, so he picks up a job at the local mall. He works in the food court at a little burger shop. He’s officially been on the job for all of three hours and he’s spent all of it starting at the cutest guy he’s ever seen at the coffee shop across the court. The coffee shop’s been busy ever since Kirishima got to work, but this guy’s been killing it ever since Kirishima started staring at him. The barista takes a moment to wipe his brow and catches Kirishima’s gaze and waves at him. Kirishima goes red instantly and runs to a backroom. He makes a mental note to stop by the coffee shop on his break.

summary: Doki-doki Todoroki part 3: a Tsuchako side story is up! Excerpt: “Why didn’t you tell me?” Tsuyu tilts her head in confusion....
caption:
Doki-doki Todoroki part 3: a Tsuchako side story is up!

Excerpt:

“Why didn’t you tell me?” Tsuyu tilts her head in confusion. Cute.

“I… Because I was afraid,” Ochako looks down, studying the pattern of her comforter for a moment. “I thought that, if I told you, you might be weirded out or something. I thought you only saw me as a friend, and every time I got my hopes up that maybe you felt the same way, I got scared and talked myself out of it. But…” she meets Tsuyu’s eyes once more, “you really like me?”

Read Feels Like Floating // Read Doki-doki Todoroki

blog.name: ao3feed-bakudeku
blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: Is it Possible to Fix Something so Broken?
title: Is it Possible to Fix Something so Broken?
description:
by Emerald_Leaf

You would think that getting a quirk would fix a lot of the problems Izuku Midoriya faced prior to high school.

Maybe it does. But that doesn’t mean that his new quirk does not lead to quite a few changes in the life of our favorite green haired boy.

Especially when it comes to his relationship with Bakugo Katsuki.

Words: 1739, Chapters: 1/7, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of Quirk!Izuku AU

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Major Character Death
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Tsubasa (My Hero Academia), Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), middle school class
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Prequel is finally here!, relationship backstory, Quirks don’t solve every issue-

summary: Ikigai - Chapter 5 - IronicVeghead - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
title: Ikigai - Chapter 5 - IronicVeghead - 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 5/10
Fandom: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou
Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Aizawa Shouta | Eraserhead, Uraraka Ochako, Yaoyorozu Momo
Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - SCP Foundation, Betas confirmed - okay to read without any prior knowledge of what SCP is
Summary:

Ikigai (生き甲斐) “A reason for being”

Agent Bakugou Katsuki has proven himself to be a top contender at containing and controlling dangerous anomalies. But when he’s assigned to monitor a new capture, a demon-like creature who calls himself Kirishima, Bakugou finds himself questioning the morality of the Foundation’s work. Kiribaku.

“The Foundation finds things, creatures, and people that can do dangerous things. They take those dangerous things and decide what to do with them. If they can’t make the dangerous things safe, then they lock them away so they can’t hurt anyone else.”

~SCP Foundation AU. Written to be read without any prior knowledge of the SCP~

summary:
Iida: Let’s just say I was the president of the stenographers’ club in high school for a reason.
Uraraka: Was that reason...
body:
Iida: Let’s just say I was the president of the stenographers’ club in high school for a reason.

Uraraka: Was that reason because you were the only member?

Iida: …yes.

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Todoroki Fuyumi, Todoroki Family, Todoroki Shoto, Midoriya Izuku, Endeavor Warnings:...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Todoroki Fuyumi, Todoroki Family, Todoroki Shoto, Midoriya Izuku, Endeavor
Warnings: Abuse, Violence, Missing Person

Prompt:  Fuyumi is used to her brothers leaving and not coming back. She’s covered for them all before when Endeavor asks. It’s not until Midoriya Izuku comes asking for Shoto the second day of him being gone that she thinks something is wrong. Because if Shoto would tell anyone, it’d be his friend, right?

- kunnskat on AO3
